name: CancelBackup
description:
Cancel a backup by its ID from a specified backend storage.

Use this tool to delete a backup using its unique ID from a specified backend storage location, ensuring the backup is no longer retrievable.

parameters.name: storage_backend_system
parameters.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup resides (e.g., 'filesystem', 'gcs', 's3', 'azure').

value_schema.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup resides (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

parameters.name: backup_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the backup to delete. Must be URL-safe, using lowercase, numbers, underscores, and minus characters.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the backup to delete. Must be URL-safe and compatible with filesystem paths (only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed).

parameters.name: specified_bucket_name
parameters.description: Specifies the bucket, container, or volume name if required by the backend storage system. Optional parameter.

value_schema.description: Optional: Specifies the bucket, container, or volume name if required by the backend.

parameters.name: backup_subpath
parameters.description: Specifies the optional path within the storage if the backup is not at the root.

value_schema.description: Optional: Specifies the path within the bucket/container/volume if the backup is not at the root.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Optional: Specifies the bucket, container, or volume name if required by the backend.

value_schema.description: Optional: Specifies the bucket, container, or volume name if required by the backend.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Optional: Specifies the path within the bucket/container/volume if the backup is not at the root.

value_schema.description: Optional: Specifies the path within the bucket/container/volume if the backup is not at the root.

parameters.name: backend
parameters.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup resides (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

value_schema.description: Specifies the backend storage system where the backup resides (e.g., `filesystem`, `gcs`, `s3`, `azure`).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the backup to delete. Must be URL-safe and compatible with filesystem paths (only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed).

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the backup to delete. Must be URL-safe and compatible with filesystem paths (only lowercase, numbers, underscore, minus characters allowed).
